scripts.build: tsc && rollup --external tslib --input ./lib/index.js --file ./lib/index-cjs.js --format cjs --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve && npm run build:terser
scripts.build:terser: TEMP=$(mktemp) && rm $TEMP && for FILE in $(find ./lib -name '*.js'); do terser --compress --mangle toplevel --name-cache $TEMP --mangle-props reserved=[__esModule,__extends],regex=/^__/ --output $FILE -- $FILE; done && rm $TEMP || exit 1
scripts.docs:release: npm run docs:build && SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url) && TEMP=$(mktemp -d) && git clone -b ghpages --single-branch $ORIGIN $TEMP && ls -A $TEMP | grep -wv .git | xargs rm -rf && cp -R ./docs/ $TEMP && cd $TEMP && git add . && git commit -m "Updated docs ($SHA)" && git push && rm -rf $TEMP
